summary: Can find in solitude in the blue palace :D your welcome
descriptionHtml:
Astrid leader of the Dark Brotherhood is finally safe in solitude and you can marry her and have her as a follower.
People who love Astrid will be pleased this is released as i was pleased when i made it.
All you need is the .esp file if you manually download it place it in your data folder or use nexus mod download button and it'll do it for you. once you have it downloaded activate the esp file and go to the blue palace
NOTE: she wont show up if you havent at least started the wolfskull cave quest. i dont know how to fix this sorry people you dont have to do the quest all you have to do is get the quest leave and reenter the blue palace and she'll be at the top of the stairs... her disposition is already at 100 :D

Fixed the speech problem she had where you couldnt speak to her... Uploaded a hoodless version of her so you can see her face now
author: AvionPire

files.name: Astrid Speech FIX
files.changelogHtml:
Added Astrid
Fixed Dialogue problem
Added Hoodless Version of Astrid
